title: HTML & CSS
description: Master the foundations of web development. Learn semantic HTML for structure and accessibility, and CSS for styling and layout. Understand the 'why' behind web standards.

modules.name: Fundamentals
modules.description: Core HTML and CSS concepts every web developer must know

modules.name: Layout & Responsive Design
modules.description: CSS layout systems, responsive design, and modern styling techniques

modules.name: Advanced Techniques
modules.description: Advanced CSS patterns, architecture, and optimization
